Desc.entry: Responsible for delivering an efficient public transport network for South Yorkshire. Through its various outlets it provides information on routes, fares and timetables for buses, trams and trains and issues concessionary and mobility passes. Deals with passengers' complaints against individual bus companies. Responsible for the siting and maintenance of bus stops and bus shelters, Park and Ride, Traveline and Travel Information Centres.

Telephone.entry: 11 Broad Street West Head Office Reception
